text: Karl Moik (19 June 1938 â€“ 26 March 2015) was an Austrian television presenter and singer. Moik was born in Linz. He became famous in Austria, Germany, German-speaking Switzerland and South Tyrol as the television presenter of Musikantenstadl on Austrian broadcaster ORF. He presented Musikantenstadtl from 1981 to 2005 earning him the honorary title by fans as Mr Musikantenstadl. Moik died in Salzburg, aged 76. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Austrian singers Category:People from Linz Category:Television presenters
title: Karl Moik
